text: Losin' It is a 1983 Canadian American sex comedy movie directed by Curtis Hanson and starring Tom Cruise, Shelley Long, Jackie Earle Haley, John Stockwell, Henry Darrow, Mario Marcelino, Rick Rossovich. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1983 comedy movies Category:1980s road movies Category:1980s sex comedy movies Category:Canadian comedy movies Category:American sex comedy movies Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Movies directed by Curtis Hanson Category:Movies set in Mexico
title: Losin' It
